scripts.build: vue-tsc --noEmit && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.extra: npm run extra:tray && npm run extra:console && npm run extra:move
scripts.extra:move: move /Y tray\target\release\tray.dll dist\ && move /Y tray\target\release\console.dll dist\
scripts.tar: tar cf metadata-fetcher.tar package.json deno.json *.md run.bat lib/* dist/*
scripts.7z: 7z a metadata-fetcher.7z -m0=LZMA2 -mx=9 -mhc=off -ms=on -mqs=on -- package.json deno.json *.md run.bat lib/* dist/*
